Title: Relates to regulatory flexibility for small businesses
Summary: Relates to consideration of the potential impacts of a proposed rule on small businesses and local governments; requires additional efforts to notify interested small businesses or local governments and/or organizations representing their interests of proposed rules.
LawCode: Amd ยง202-b, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state administrative procedure act, in relation to consideration of the potential impacts of a proposed rule on small businesses and local governments
